sent.orig: The trucks sang "lickety-lick, lickety-lick" as the train ran through the factory district.
sent.trans: 列车经过工厂区时，卡车发出咔嗒、咔嗒的有节奏的声音。

sent.orig: Even a fox will lick its hindquarters, but some of the faeries were the dirtiest beasts.
sent.trans: 就连一只狐狸也会舔后腿，可是有些仙灵是最肮脏的野兽。

sent.orig: I could lick you with one hand tied behind me, if I wanted to."
sent.trans: 如果我想打倒你的话，一只手背在后面都能打过你。”

sent.orig: What does an envelope say when you lick it?
sent.trans: 你舔信封一下，它说什麽？

sent.orig: When the order is given, lick on!
sent.trans: 命令一下就开始跟踪攻击目标。
